1/* $NetBSD: count6bits.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:36 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*
4 * Copyright (C) 2012 by Darren Reed.
5 *
6 * See the IPFILTER.LICENCE file for details on licencing.
7 *
8 * Id: count6bits.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:38 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10
11#include "ipf.h"
12
13
14int count6bits(msk)
15 u_32_t *msk;
16{
17 int i = 0, k;
18 u_32_t j;
19
20 for (k = 3; k >= 0; k--)
21 if (msk[k] == 0xffffffff)
22 i += 32;
23 else {
24 for (j = msk[k]; j; j <<= 1)
25 if (j & 0x80000000)
26 i++;
27 }
28 return i;
29}
30
